description: Learned borrowing from Latin assiduus, from assidere (“to sit down to”), from ad- (“to”) + sedere (“to sit”).

adjectives.description: assiduous (comparative more assiduous, superlative most assiduous)

entries.meaning: Hard-working, diligent or regular (in attendance or work); industrious.
examples: Synonyms: meticulous, diligent, sedulous; see also Thesaurus:industrious
